import React from 'react' import { HeartOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const DogCard = ({ dog, keepTheDog }) => { const { img_url, breed, subbreed, liked } = dog console.log(dog) const handleAddDog = e => { e.preventDefault() localStorage.setItem('dogs', JSON.stringify({ breed, subbreed, img_url, liked: true })) keepTheDog(img_url) } const likedOrNot = () => { return liked ? 'deeppink' : '' } return (
keep
{breed}
{subbreed}
) } export default DogCard
